desc: Today: Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. Light and variable wind becoming west 8 to 13 mph in the afternoon.
Tonight: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. West wind 9 to 14 mph.

Wednesday Night: Increasing clouds, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 7 to 11 mph.
Thursday: Partly sunny, with a high near 63. West southwest wind 3 to 8 mph.
Thursday Night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53.
Friday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65.
Friday Night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52.
Saturday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65.
